org.mini2Dx.ui.effect

Interface UiEffect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SlideIn, SlideOut

    public interface UiEffect
    An effect to be applied to a UiElement

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isFinished()
      True if the effect has completed and should be removed from the UiElement
      void postEnd(UiElement element)
      Called after the effect ends
      void postRender(Graphics g)
      Called after rendering the UiElement
      void preBegin(UiElement element)
      Called before the effect begins
      void preRender(Graphics g)
      Called before rendering the UiElement
      boolean update(UiContainerRenderTree uiContainer, CollisionBox currentArea, Rectangle targetArea, float delta)
      Updates the effect

    • Method Detail

      • preBegin

        void preBegin(UiElement element)
        Called before the effect begins
        Parameters:
        element - The UiElement the effect is applied to

      • postEnd

        void postEnd(UiElement element)
        Called after the effect ends
        Parameters:
        element - The UiElement the effect was applied to

      • update

        boolean update(UiContainerRenderTree uiContainer,
             CollisionBox currentArea,
             Rectangle targetArea,
             float delta)
        Updates the effect
        Parameters:
        uiContainer - The UiContainerRenderTree the UiElement belongs to
        currentArea - The current area that the UiElement is set to render in. Manipulate this to change where the element renders.
        targetArea - The target area that the UiElement is set to render in as specified by the render tree and layout.
        delta - The frame delta
        Returns:
        True if the UiElement should be rendered

      • preRender

        void preRender(Graphics g)
        Called before rendering the UiElement
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context

      • postRender

        void postRender(Graphics g)
        Called after rendering the UiElement
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context

      • isFinished

        boolean isFinished()
        True if the effect has completed and should be removed from the UiElement
        Returns:
